name: Microworld
description:
Microworld is an text-based adventure game.

You are transformed into an electron, and must travel through the circuits of your computer. The goal is to repair the malfunctioning computer by gathering 8 colored chips and rebooting the computer. Designed to teach how computers function, most puzzles require some degree of computer knowledge. All commands are via VERB NOUN entry, and the goal is to explore and learn about the function of the computer. There is a save and restore feature.
